message.body: If you want to come to communal dinner tonight at 7 you are welcome!
Dins should be ready in 5 or 6
Good! Haha overwhelming and boring at the same time, if that's possible.
Makes sense when you are just starting I think. Just basic orienting stuff or are you doing real work already?
Um you tots found that out on my tumblr didn't you
/yes you should absolutely get a twitter so you can read Hilary's tweets
Get ready to get some "greekified" fries with a side of "greekified" reduced price drank tonight at 5:30 at opa (1311 Sansom)!

Just a heads up you got a bill from PECO, just the $6 standard connection charge. Due June 25. Also I am paying our June Comcast bill which is $83.99 (49 of which is activation fee...such bullshit. Oh well.)
